description: Fired when a dismembered body part is spawned as a pickable entity in the world

entityId.description: ID of the character who lost the body part

spawnedEntityId.description: ID of the newly spawned body part entity

spawnedEntityName.description: Display name of the spawned entity (e.g., "Sarah's left leg")

orientation.description: Orientation of the part (left, right, mid, or null for parts without orientation)

definitionId.description: Entity definition ID used to spawn the body part (e.g., 'anatomy:human_leg')

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the body part was spawned
